description: Stores the history of the changes in the current collection agency assigned to a charge. (Not populated for agency account workqueue based assignment).

columns.name: TX_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: This line number identifies the sequence of changes in the assigned agency for a transaction.

columns.name: AGENCY_ID
columns.description: Stores the collection agency to which a charge is assigned.

columns.name: AGENCY_ID_COLL_AGENCY_NAME
columns.description: The name of the collection agency.

columns.name: SENT_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant a charge was sent to a collection agency. This value is stored as a UTC instant.

columns.name: RETURN_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant a charge returned from its assigned collection agency.  This value is stored as a UTC instant.
